utils.POD package

Submodules

utils.POD.fits module

utils.POD.fits.elbow_fit(x, y)[source]

Retrieves number of modes following the elbow criteria

Parameters:

  • x – array of mode index

  • y – array of cumulative energies for each mode index

Returns:

number of modes (not index)

utils.POD.fits.energy_truncation(S, E)[source]

Retrieves number of modes reaching a certain cumulative energy level

Parameters:

  • S – array of singular values (N_r)

  • E – energy threshold

Returns:

number of modes (not index)

utils.POD.obtain_basis module

utils.POD.obtain_basis.get_ROM(D, r_method, r_threshold, dDdt=[])[source]

Retrieves POD complete and truncated basis

Parameters:

  • D – snapshot matrix

  • r_method – flag to select truncation method

  • r_threshold – corresponding threshold value for given truncation method

  • dDdt – derivative of snapshot matrix

Returns:

POD dictionary

utils.POD.obtain_basis.get_cumenergy(Sigma)[source]

Retrieves cumulative energy :param Sigma: singular value array :return: cumulative energy array

utils.POD.obtain_basis.get_rerr(Phi, Sigma, Psi, D)[source]

Get reconstruction error array up to n_r modes :param Phi: spatial modes :param Sigma: singular value array :param Psi: temporal modes (transposed) :param D: snapshot matrix :return: error array
